text:
Gaming Control (Infringement Notices) Regulations 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Gaming Control Act 1993 .

22 March 2021

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Gaming Control (Infringement Notices) Regulations 2021 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on 27 April 2021.

3. Interpretation
    In these regulations –
        Act means the Gaming Control Act 1993 .

4. Infringement notice offences and penalties
    For the purposes of section 172A of the Act –
            (a) an infringement offence is an offence against a provision of the Act specified in column 2 of Schedule 1 ; and
            (b) the penalty specified in column 3 of Schedule 1 in relation to an infringement offence is the penalty applicable to that offence.

SCHEDULE 1 - Infringement Notice Offences and Penalties

Notified in the Gazette on 31 March 2021

These regulations are administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
